short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables the alt/option + click download shortcut on Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Fed up with accidental downloads cluttering your computer? üò†  I feel your pain!**  "Disable alt/option + Click shortcut" is the ultimate Chrome extension for those who've had enough of the alt/option + click mayhem.  ü§Ø

**Take back control of your clicks!**  üñ±Ô∏è My lightweight extension empowers you to disable the alt/option + click shortcut, preventing those frustrating surprise downloads.  No more unwanted files hogging your storage space!  üö´

Say goodbye to click-induced chaos and hello to stress-free browsing!  ‚úÖ

**Key benefits**:

* **Disable alt/option + click downloads**: Prevent those unwanted surprises.
* **Lightweight and efficient**: Won't slow down your browser (Around 10 lines of code)
* **Easy to install and use**: Just add to the browser and done!
* **Free and open source**: Check out the code here: https://github.com/vighnesh153/vighnesh153-monorepo/tree/main/nodejs-tools/nodejs-chrome-extensions/disable-alt-click-download
